value.title: AI Weekly: The Russia-Ukraine conflict is a test case for AI in warfare

value.title: Why AI and Robotics are the Key to True Digital Transformation

value.title: The Strategic Building Blocks Of Ethical AI: Representation, Governance And Leadership

value.title: New ACM TechBrief spotlights privacy, ethics problems with facial recognition technology

value.title: Facial recognition technology faces mounting legal, ethical questions

value.title: New Zealand to develop ethical AI strategy based on trust
value.excerpt: New Zealand is developing an approach to supporting the ethical adoption of AI, focusing on building an AI ecosystem on a foundation of trust, equity, and accessibility. The new AI strategy is part of this plan and is structured around five cornerstones.
